{{cpp/experimental/pmr/memory_resource/title|allocate}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions/pmr/memory_resource/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=libfund_ts|1=
void* allocate( std::size_t bytes, std::size_t alignment = alignof(std::max_align_t) );
}}

Allocates storage with a size of at least {{c|bytes}} bytes. The returned storage is aligned to the specified {{c|alignment}} if such alignment is supported, and to {{c|alignof(std::max_align_t)}} otherwise. 

Equivalent to {{c|return do_allocate(bytes, alignment);}}.

===Exceptions===
Throws an exception if storage of the requested size and alignment cannot be obtained.
